sandy.util.RotationUtil

type
class
version
3.1
Utility class for tweening ATransformale rotaions.

Constructor

new()

Instance Variables

enableRoll : Bool

If enabled, rolls ATransformable while tweening.

obj : sandy.core.scenegraph.ATransformable

ATransformable object to tween.

Initial "out" Point3D.

out1(__getOut1,__setOut1) : sandy.core.data.Point3D

Final "out" Point3D.

roll0 : Float

Initial roll angle.

roll1 : Float

Final roll angle.

t(__getT,__setT) : Float

Tweening variable (tween this from 0 to 1).

Resets object (useful to call after tweening).
